summary:
Toyota is a huge Japanese car company, making around 10 million cars each year. It started in 1937 and grew from a small firm to a world leader. After World War II, Toyota learned from American car makers and created new ways of building cars quickly and efficiently. This helped them become the biggest car manufacturer globally.

They make many popular cars, like the Toyota Corolla, and are known for their hybrid electric cars, such as the Prius. Toyota owns several brands, including Lexus, and has a big presence worldwide.
title: Toyota
